actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide that the project referred to as the Chatfield Dam and Lake on the South Platte River, Colo., shall hereafter be known and designated as the Edwin C. Johnson Dam and Lake.

summary.text: Provides that the project referred to as the Chatfield Dam and Lake on the South Platte River, Colorado, shall hereafter be known and designated as the "Edwin C. Johnson Dam and Lake," in honor of Edwin C. Johnson and in recognition of his long and outstanding service as a member of the Colorado State Legislature.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the project referred to as the Chatfield Dam and Lake on the South Platte River, Colo., shall hereafter be known and designated as the Edwin C. Johnson Dam and Lake.
